Text:
Thank you!!

You are a real friend to many, many of us out here.

You are all welcome.

2 full months of shows served today.

Starting this weekend I will be sharing some interesting old pdf scan books of conservative and free market legends. They can be read on many/most e-readers or regular computers alike.

Keep an eye out tomorrow, around noon (EST)

a better phrasing would be...

pdf format books of old libertarian, conservative, and free market legends.

Most excellent, Annoyme - looking forward to the good reads :)

Have a safe weekend, all!

Thanks again, Annoyme. Have a great weekend!

Arsventure, got "A Conservative History of the American Left" by Daniel Flynn by any chance?
Testing 1,2,3... are my comments going to show up this time?

@sel96

Alas, that title never came out as an audiobook.

I could read my copy to you, but that would suck!!

Just kidding!  I think I will start out with books that I ripped from cassettes that never were out on CD.

In honor of the post, I will start out with the Rush books - they were what opened my eyes way back when!!
